message.content: {"id": "11280", "title": "Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state", "description": "When switching perspectives in the application, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized. A view that is maximized should stay maximized.", "OB": "The CVS repository view should remain maximized when switching perspectives.", "EB": "The CVS repository view is no longer maximized after switching perspectives.", "SR": "Ensure that the CVS repository view maintains its maximized state when switching perspectives."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11280', 'title': 'Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'The CVS repository view is no longer maximized. A view that is maximized should stay maximized. ', 'SR': ''}
